cards.rules_text:
When Burnout is put into your hand or kept in your opening hand, reveal it, then put it onto the battlefield with three motivation counters on it.
At the beginning of your upkeep, remove a motivation counter on Burnout. At the beginning of your end step, if Burnout has no motivation counters on it, sacrifice Burnout.
{1}{R}{R}, Sacrifice Burnout: Deal 10 damage to a permanent.
Copy the last spell other than Blueprint that you cast this turn. You may cast the copy without paying its mana cost, and you may choose new targets for the copy.
When Varden Dawngrasp enters the battlefield, it deals 4 damage to each tapped creature you don't control, then tap all creatures you don't control and put a stun counter on them.
Exile your hand. For each card exiled, deal 7 damage to target permanent.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“The remaining soldier of the Ironclads sold his soul to harness demonic energies.”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Menace
When Ghost Rider, Vegnence enters the battlefield, put target creature card that entered the graveyard this turn onto the battlefield with a finality counter on it.

Menace
When Alioth, the Usurper enters the battlefield, remove the rules text from all creatures target player controls. [i](They lose all keywords, activated abilities, triggered abilities, and static abilities. Auras and Equipment cards played before but not after Alioth, the Usurper affecting the creature are disabled.)[/i]

Indestructible, Trample, Reach
Companion — Your deck consists of exactly 7 unique cards. [i](If this card is your chosen companion, you may put it into your hand from outside the game for {3} as a sorcery.)[/i]
At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal Arishem, The Judge from outside the game. If you do, open a sealed [i]Magic[/i] booster pack, then shuffle those cards into your library.

Devoid [i](This card has no color.)[/i]
When Mr. Negative, Chinatown Kingpin enters the battlefield, exile your hand. You may play creature cards you exile this way, and they have their mana value and powers swapped. [i](Their power is equal to their mana value, and casting the creature costs generic mana equal to their power.)[/i]
cards.notes:
it has to stay at 4 mana because of 60 card formats.

they will chew this card up with clone effects and simic.

cards.rules_text: Whenever a player casts a spell, if the amount of mana spent to cast it was less than the spell's mana value, counter that spell.

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature that died this turn.
Draw 2 cards.
Commander creatures you control have “Persist.” [i](When that creature dies, if it had no -1/-1 counters on it, return it to the battlefield under its owner's control with a -1/-1 counter on it.)[/i]

First strike
Whenever Violet Evergarden, Soldier Maiden deals combat damage to a creature, set it's base power to 0. If you do, put a page counter on Violet Evergarden, Soldier Maiden.
{T}: Draw cards equal to the number of page counters on Violet Evergarden, Soldier Maiden, then remove a page counter.
Each consecutive time you cast a spell with the same name, it costs {1} less for each card with the same name cast before it.
The first triggered ability that you control each turn triggers twice.

When Wooly, Elephant Quest enters the battlefield, you may sacrifice an artifact. If you do, search your library for an artifact equipment card with converted mana cost equal to 1 plus the sacrificed artifact's converted mana cost, put that card onto the battlefield attached to Wooly, Elephant Quest, then shuffle your library.

Deathtouch
Companion — Each non-land card in your starting deck has a different casting cost. [i](for example: {2} is different than {1}{W}, {W}{W}, or {W}{B}.)[/i] 
When Nyxia, the Dragon's Embrace enters the battlefield, for each non-land permanent you control with different mana values, destroy up to one target permanent an opponent controls with the same mana value.

Whenever one or more +1/+1 counters would be put on another creature, that many minus one +1/+1 counters are put on that permanent instead, then put a +1/+1 counter on Fugue, Traveler of No Return. 
Whenever Fugue, Traveler of No Return attacks, exile the top X cards of your library, where X is equal to Fugue, Traveler of No Return's power. You may play those cards this turn.

Jane Doe can't block and can't be blocked.
At the beginning of each opponent's upkeep, you may have that player gain control of Jane Doe until end of turn. If you do, untap Jane Doe, goad it, and it can't be sacrificed this turn.
Whenever Jane Doe deals combat damage to a player, that player reveals their hand. Jane Doe's owner chooses a nonland card from it. That player discards that card.

Indestructible, Trample, Haste
This creature costs {1} less to cast for each mana in your mana pool that was not generated this turn.

Menace
Each artifact equipment card in your hand without living weapon has living weapon. [i](When this Equipment enters, create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token, then attach this to it.)[/i]
Whenever Phyrexian Germ creature token dies, lose 1 life and draw a card.

Vigilance
When Viper Ning, Blind Blademaster enters the battlefield, for each opponent, choose a creature that player controls. At the beginning of your upkeep, if Viper Ning, Blind Blademaster is on the battlefield, destroy those creatures.

First strike, Haste
Whenever Tracer, Slipstream Skirmisher deals combat damage to a creature, destroy that creature. It can't be regenerated.
{U}: Return Tracer, Slipstream Skirmisher to your hand.

This creature's power is equal to the highest power among other creatures you control, and its toughness is equal to the highest toughness among other creatures you control.
Companion — Each creature in your starting deck shares the same base power or shares the same base toughness.
Each other creature you control with the highest base power among creatures you control have their power doubled.
Each other creature you control with the highest base toughness among creatures you control have their toughness doubled.

When Ningguang, The Tianquan enters the battlefield, create a Treasure token, then draw a card for each Treasure token you control.
Whenever you sacrifice a Treasure token, create a 0/5 white Wall creature token with defender.

Hexproof
Whenever a creature is targeted by a spell or activated ability, you may pay {1}. If you do, Athena, Benign Devotion loses hexproof and gives that target creature hexproof until end of turn.

Companion — Each card in your starting deck shares at least one object in their artwork. [i](Check Scryfall's art tags!)[/i]
When Hwei, The Visionary enters the battlefield, choose an object. For each permanent you control with the chosen object in its art, draw a card and gain 1 life.
Whenever a source you control with fire in their art deals damage, it deal twice as much damage instead.
When Shady Merchant enters the battlefield, target opponent chooses to creates a Blood, Clue, Junk, or Treasure token. You create the rest.

Flying
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, surveil 1 from that player's library. [i](Look at the top card of that player's library. You may put that card into their graveyard.)[/i]

Flying
At the beginning of each player's upkeep, that player draws a card then discard a card at random.

Evolve [i](Whenever a creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than this creature, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature.)[/i]
Whenever a creature Evolves, you may put a flying, first strike, deathtouch, hexproof, haste, lifelink, menace, reach, trample, or vigilance counter on it.
{G}{U}, {T}: Target creature Evolves twice as though two creatures with power or toughness greater than it entered the battlefield under your control.
Whenever you cast a spell, if it shares the same name as the last spell cast before it this turn, copy it.

You may play Shark creatures from exile.
[i]Sharknado! [/i]— {2}{W}{U}: Exile each other creature. When Jeff the Baby Land Shark leaves the battlefield, return them to their owner's hand.

All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
[i]Hellbent[/i] — If you have no cards in hand, it also gains deathtouch.
Commander creatures you control have “Vehicles you control gain +2/+2.”
For each player, destroy up to one target non-basic land that player controls. For each land destroyed this way, its controller creates a Treasure tokens.

Commander creatures you control have “Evolve.” [i](Whenever a creature you control enters, if that creature has greater power or toughness than that creature, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.)[/i]
Commander creatures you control have “Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, draw a card then discard a card.”

Emerge {5}{U}{B} [i](You may cast this spell by sacrificing a creature and paying the emerge cost reduced by that creature's mana value.)[/i]
When Consumer of All enters the battlefield, destroy target creature. Put X +1/+1 counters on Consumer of All, where X is equal to the mana value of the destroyed creature.

Menace, Lifelink
Whenever a non-Human creature you don't control dies, mutate it under this creature. [i](Put the creature under Stealer of Faces. They mutate into the creature on top plus all abilities from under it.)[/i]

Deathtouch
When Corpse Puppeteer enters the battlefield, put target creature from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control for as long as you control Corpse Puppeteer.

This creature costs {1} less for each instant and sorcery in your graveyard.
When Jungle Stalker enters the battlefield, tap target creature. It doesn't untap during its controller's untap step.

Target creature you control gains a keyword of your choice from another creature you control until the end of your next turn.
Draw a card.

Menace, First strike
When Skittering Corpsepede dies, create three 1/1 Centipede Segment creature tokens with menace and three 1/1 Centipede Segment creature tokens with first strike.

Menace
Whenever an Insect creature you control deals combat damage to a player, it gains “When this creature dies, draw a card then lose 1 life” until end of turn.

Indestructible
Other creatures have “Whenever this creature attacks, you may have it fight Coinbox Hero.”
Whenever Coinbox Hero is dealt combat damage, that source's controller creates a treasure token.

Koh, The Face Stealer enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it, where X is the amount of mana spent to cast it.
Koh, The Face Stealer's mana value is equal to its power.
Transfigure {B}{B} [i]({B}{B}, Sacrifice this creature: Search your library for a creature card with the same mana value as this creature, put that card onto the battlefield, then shuffle. Transfigure only as a sorcery.)[/i]

Menace
When Kerrigan, Queen of Blades enters the battlefield, create two black and green 0/1 Insect creature tokens with “Creatures in your hand that emerge from this creature cost {3} less.”

Skulk [i](This creature can't be blocked by creatures with greater power.)[/i]
When Industrial Saboteur deals combat damage to a player, search their library for a card, reveal it, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it.

As long as you control no tapped lands, equipped creature has +3/+3.
Equip {2}

Put a card in your hand onto the battlefield face down as a legendary artifact equipment with “When equipped creature attacks, you may turn this card face up if its an artifact equipment card” and “equip {1}.”

Enchant player
Whenever enchanted player takes damage, exile up to one target card from their graveyard.

At the beginning of combat on your turn, target artifact becomes 4/4 Toy creature in addition to its other types, then put your choice of a flying, first strike, hexproof, haste, lifelink, trample, or vigilance counter on artifact Toy creatures you control.
Create an 0/X colorless artifact Toy creature token, where X is equal to target attack creature's power. It gains Indestructible until end of turn.

At the beginning of your upkeep, target non-basic land becomes a 1/1 artifact Toy creature in addition to its other types.
Tap an untapped artifact toy creature you control: Draw a card.

Sliver Parasite enters the battlefield attached to target creature you don't control. 
While Sliver Parasite is attached to a creature, its not a creature and has “Whenever a creature you control dies, Sliver Parasite's owner creates a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token.”
Target non-Human creature gains “While this creature is saddled, it has Myriad” and Saddle 2 until end of turn.

Lifelink
Deal 3 damage to a creature. If you've lost life from a source you control this turn, deal 5 damage instead.

As an additional cost to cast Encased in Amber, exile a creature card from your hand.
When Encased in Amber leaves the battlefield, put all creature cards exiled by Encased in Amber onto the battlefield tapped.

Flying
{T}: Add {G} to your mana pool.
{T}: Remove a counter from target permanent or destroy target aura enchantment.

Flying
Megamorph {1}{G} [i](You may cast this face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its megamorph cost and put a +1/+1 counter on it.)[/i]
When Sandara Moss Dragon is turned face up, remove target creature from combat.

First strike, Menace
As long as Emersontung's Holy Warrior is crewed by a creature with power 4 or greater, it gains indestructible.
Crew 4 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 4 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

Defender
At the beginning of your upkeep, put a nest counter on Henry Peter's Spider Eggs, then create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach for each counter on Henry Peter's Spider Eggs.

Reach
Whenever a creature crews Henry Peters Spider Carriage, sacrifice it. If you do, return a land from your graveyard to your hand and create a food token.
Crew 1 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Spider Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]

As an additional cost to cast this spell, name a card type.
Exile the top card of your library. If a card that shares the named card type is exiled this way, choose one:
• Target creature gains +X/+X until end of turn, where X is equal to the mana value of the exiled card.
• You may play that card until the end of your next turn.

Defender, Reach
Your opponents play open handed.

When Merfolk Tidecaller, put a flood counter on target non-basic land. That land is an Island for as long as it has a flood counter on it. 
Merfolk Tidecaller has +X/+0, where X is equal to the number of Islands your opponents control.
Other Merfolk you control gain +1/+0 for each non-basic island your opponents control.

When Crabellemental enters the battlefield, reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a Crab or Elemental card. Put that card into your hand, and the rest of the bottom of your library.
Destroy target creature. If you do, its controller creates a token that's a copy of it. Its an artifact. [i](Its not a creature)[/i]
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Now, he's just a mess of parts. I think the employees refer to him as just... The Mangle”[/i]

cards.rules_text: Sacrifice Banner of Command: Untap creatures you control. They gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
Sacrifice City of Glass, {3}{W}: Untap creatures you control. They gain lifelink until end of turn.

Deathtouch, Reach
{2}, Exile Glint Spider from your graveyard: Shuffle target opponent's library, then put Glint Spider on top of it.

Defender
When Infernal Crate dies, exile the top card of your library until you exile a demon creature. Put it onto the battlefield. That creature gains haste.
Blitz {3}{B}{R} [i](If you cast this spell for its blitz cost, it gains haste and “When this creature dies, draw a card”. Sacrifice it at the beginning of the next end step.)[/i]

Menace
When Rat Prince enters the battlefield, target opponent becomes the monarch. 
At the beginning of your end step, if you're not the monarch, sacrifice Rat Prince.

When Rat Thief enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose a creature card from it. If you do, that player puts it onto the battlefield face down under their control as a 2/2 creature. At the beginning of your end step, turn it face up.

When Buckroyd Shaman enters the battlefield, target opponent reveals their hand. You may choose any number of cards from it. For each card chosen this way, put that card on the bottom of its owner's library, then that player draws a card.

Put X egg counters on each creature, where X is equal to its toughness. Until the end of your next turn, whenever a creature with an egg counter dies, create X 1/1 rats where X is the equal to the number of egg counters on them.

Commander creatures you control have “At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control other creatures, sacrifice them, then put X +1/+1 counters on this creature, where X is the number of creatures sacrificed this way.”
cards.flavor_text: [i]Despite the pleadings of nymphs, Narcissus would die there by the pool looking at his reflection. [/i]

cards.rules_text: {T}: Exile a non-creature card with mana value equal to the number of cards in your hand. You may play that card this turn. The next time you cast that card, copy it.
Commander creatures you control have “Whenever this creature attacks alone, it gains +3/+3 and your choice of flying, first strike, or lifelink until end of turn.”

Enchant player
If enchanted player would mill one or more cards, they mill that many cards plus four instead.
{3}, {T}: Exile enchanted player's graveyard.
Set target creature's power equal to the greatest power among other creatures you control.
{T}: Put a restoration counter on target land you control, then if there are two or more restoration counters on a land you control, copy them.

At the beginning of your upkeep, put a flood counter on target land. That land is an Island for as long as it has a flood counter on it. 
If every land on the battlefield is an island, Herald of the Deep has base power 8/8 with menace and indestructible.

When Marianne Whistle enters the battlefield, put a chime counter on target non-basic permanent. That permanent has “Cumulative upkeep {1}” for as long as it has a chime counter on it. 
{1}, {T}, Sacrifice Marianne Whistle: Draw a card.

Destroy target creature. Its controller reveals the top card of their library until they find a creature card with the same mana value. Put it onto the battlefield tapped, then the rest on the bottom in a random order.

{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}, Sacrifice a Food: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.

Trample
Whenever a creature you don't control takes damage, Phantom Rake gains first strike until end of turn and deals damage equal to its power to that creature.

When Forest of Dreams enters the battlefield, put target land you control on top of your library.
Lands you control have “{T}, Pay 1 life: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool.”

Cast this spell only during the declare attacks step.
You choose which creatures attack this turn and which players they attack, then choose two — 
• Give those creatures first strike until end of turn.
• Give those creatures trample until end of turn.
• Give those creatures flying until end of turn.

As Fernandes Courtyard enters the battlefield, choose a creature type.
{T}: Add {C} to your mana pool.
{T}: Add one mana of any color to your mana pool. Activate only if a creature of the chosen type entered the battlefield this turn.

Court of Chivalry enters the battlefield tapped.
Untap Court of Chivalry during each player's untap step.
{T}: The player whose turn it is may untap target land. Do this only once each turn.
{T}: Choose up to two target players and a color. At the beginning of each chosen player's next main phase, add one mana of the chosen color to that player's mana pool.

{T}: Add {U} to your mana pool.
{1}{U}, {T}: Each opponent reveals their hand.
Whenever an enchantment enters the battlefield under your control, exile target creature card from a graveyard. If you do, create a token that's a copy of it, except its 1/1 green Frog.
Return target blocking creature you control to its owner's hand. If you do, create a 2/1 white Soldier creature token blocking that same creature. Sacrifice it at the end of turn.

Flying
Whenever Sandara Whelp attacks, deal 1 damage to any target. If a creature dies this way, its controller creates a 0/1 green Plant creature token.

[i]Blood Letting[/i] — Pay 2 life: Shuffle your graveyard into your library, then draw a card and reveal it. If its a creature, discard it. Activate only as a sorcery.
[i]Drone Blood Drag[/i] — Pay 2 life: Create an 0/2 colorless Drone artifact creature token with Flying and “When this creature enters the battlefield, you may exile a creature an opponent controls with 3 or less power until this creature leaves the battlefield.” Activate only as a sorcery and only once per turn.

First strike, Vigilance, Prowess
Whenever Gwenyth, The Princess Knight attacks, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

Creature spells you cast with power 4 or greater cost {G}{G} less to cast.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control a creature with power 4 or greater, put two +1/0 counters on target creature you control.
Partner [i](You can have two commanders if both have partner.)[/i]

[i]By the Book[/i] — Whenever you cast an instant or sorcery spell, you may draw a card. If you do, discard a card. Do this only up to three times per turn.
{U}{U}{U}: Return target instant or sorcery spell from your graveyard to your hand.

Haste, Bushido 3 [i](Whenever this creature blocks or becomes blocked, it gets +3/+3 until end of turn.)[/i]
While Lathtish, Monk from the East has at least three +1/+1 counters on it, it gains Vigilance and Double strike.
Partner [i](You can have two commanders if both have partner.)[/i]

[i]Landfall[/i] — Put a +1/+1 counter on Karond, A Friendly Crab and another target creature you own. 
{B}{G}: Transform Karond, A Friendly Crab. Activate only as a sorcery and only if Karond, A Friendly Crab has at least five or more +1/+1 counters on it.
cards.rules_text2:
Trample, Menace
Whenever a creature dealt damage by Karond is Hungry this turn dies, double all +1/+1 counters on Karond is Hungry. If you do, at the beginning of your end step, transform Karond is Hungry.

cards.rules_text:
When Disorientated Leoquen enters the battlefield, return a Forest you control to its owner's hand.
{T}: Add {G}{G} to your mana pool.

Vigilance
Whenever A Knight From the North attacks, tap target creature you don't control.

When Veloram, Frostburrow Scholar enters the battlefield, you may search your library for a lesson card with mana value less than the number of snow permanents you control, reveal it, then put it into your hand.
